MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL65 postcode area of Holyhead affecting a number of properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 8:06am. Our engineers are on their way to site to investigate and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11:15am. Once they arrive, or when we receive any update regarding the cause, we will be able to provide you with more information. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:47am on the 19th February 2021.
